custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_TRELLIS
custom_nodes.description:
You can use TRELLIS in comfyUI
[a/TRELLIS](https://github.com/microsoft/TRELLIS/tree/main), Structured 3D Latents for Scalable and Versatile 3D Generation

custom_nodes.author: DarioFT
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VideoDirCombiner
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that combines multiple videos from a directory with optional transitions and background music. Perfect for batch processing and creating seamless video compilations.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Gemini_Flash_2.0_Exp
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that integrates Google's Gemini Flash 2.0 Experimental model, enabling multimodal analysis of text, images, video frames, and audio directly within ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.description: A collection of nodes to enhance your experience with ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: sebord
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LMCQ
custom_nodes.description:
ComfyUI small node toolkit, this toolkit is mainly to update some practical small nodes, to make a contribution to the comfyui ecosystem, PS: 'LMCQ' is the abbreviation of the team name
NOTE: The files in the repo are not organized, which may lead to update issues.

custom_nodes.author: krich-cto

custom_nodes.author: shannooty
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Timer Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This project provides a set of custom timer nodes for ComfyUI. These nodes allow you to measure and append runtime information to strings or other data during your workflow.

custom_nodes.author: HM-RunningHub
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_RH_OminiControl
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI_RH_OminiControl is a ComfyUI plugin based on OminiControl By splitting the pipeline load, the plugin efficiently runs on NVIDIA RTX 4090 GPUs. Additionally, the spatial and fill functionalities are generated using the schnell model, reducing the number of sampling steps and improving overall efficiency.

custom_nodes.author: Dr.Lt.Data
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Impact Subpack
custom_nodes.description: This node pack provides nodes that complement the Impact Pack, such as the UltralyticsDetectorProvider.

custom_nodes.author: SlackinJack
custom_nodes.title: distrifuser_comfyui
custom_nodes.description: [a/Distrifuser](https://github.com/mit-han-lab/distrifuser) sampler node for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Coherent Video Sampler Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that enables coherent video generation while maintaining efficient memory usage, specifically optimized for heavy models like Flux.

custom_nodes.author: if-ai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-IF_MemoAvatar
custom_nodes.description: This is a ComfyUI implementation of MEMO (Memory-Guided Diffusion for Expressive Talking Video Generation), which enables the creation of expressive talking avatar videos from a single image and audio input.

custom_nodes.author: DesertPixelAi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Desert-Pixel-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI focused on animation, image processing, and workflow optimization.

custom_nodes.description: A Python implementation for integrating the BLIP (Bootstrapping Language-Image Pre-training) model for visual question answering.

custom_nodes.author: asagi4
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI NPNet (Golden Noise)
custom_nodes.description: A very barebones mostly-copypaste implementation of [a/https://github.com/xie-lab-ml/Golden-Noise-for-Diffusion-Models](https://github.com/xie-lab-ml/Golden-Noise-for-Diffusion-Models)

custom_nodes.author: LucipherDev
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Golden-Noise
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Custom Node for [a/'Golden Noise for Diffusion Models: A Learning Framework'](https://arxiv.org/abs/2411.09502) and most of the code is adapted from [a/here](https://github.com/xie-lab-ml/Golden-Noise-for-Diffusion-Models). This node refines the initial latent noise in the diffusion process, enhancing both image quality and semantic coherence.

custom_nodes.author: envy-ai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ConDelta
custom_nodes.description: This extension extends ComfyUI's capabilities with respect to manipulating conditionings.

custom_nodes.author: abdozmantar
custom_nodes.title: DeepExtract
custom_nodes.description: DeepExtract is a powerful and efficient tool designed to separate vocals and sounds from audio files, providing an enhanced experience for musicians, producers, and audio engineers. With DeepExtract, you can quickly and effectively isolate vocals or instruments from mixed audio tracks, facilitating tasks like remixing, karaoke preparation, or audio analysis.

custom_nodes.author: kraglik
custom_nodes.title: PromptCollapse
custom_nodes.description: A prompt generation system that manages relationships between prompt components to maintain logical consistency. Integrates with ComfyUI as a custom node.

custom_nodes.author: AIFSH
custom_nodes.title: EchoMimicV2-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: a custom node for [a/echomimic_v2](https://github.com/antgroup/echomimic_v2)

custom_nodes.author: inflamously
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-prompt-enhancer
custom_nodes.description: A crazy node that pragmatically just enhances a given prompt with various descriptions in the hope that the image quality just increase and prompting just gets easier.

custom_nodes.author: 111496583yzy
custom_nodes.title: Jigsaw Puzzle Effect Plugin
custom_nodes.description: The Jigsaw Puzzle Effect plugin provides a unique puzzle effect for image processing. By dividing an image into multiple puzzle pieces and optionally adding missing pieces, users can easily create artistic puzzle effects.

custom_nodes.author: weilin9999
custom_nodes.title: WeiLin-ComfyUI-prompt-all-in-one

custom_nodes.author: nsdtcloud3d
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-3D-Convert
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-3D-Covert is a 3D File Format Conversion Extension based on 3dconvert.nsdt.cloud-API. It provides a node ConvertTo3DFormat currently available, is a powerful tool designed to streamline the conversion of 3D models between a wide array of file formats.

custom_nodes.author: ctefer
custom_nodes.title: CFE_comfyui
custom_nodes.description: This is a subset of nodes for ComfyUI that I made just for my own workflow. The nodes support Flux (single conditioning, no negatives) and are just a way of minimizing the noodles. There's no real journey to be made here, just anything that helps me get through the day.

custom_nodes.author: mithamunda
custom_nodes.title: Together Vision Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for generating AI-powered image descriptions using Together AI's Vision models (both free and paid versions). Features include customizable prompts, advanced generation parameters, and robust image handling with comprehensive error management.

custom_nodes.author: NeoGriever
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI - NeoGriever
custom_nodes.description: NeoGriever's helper nodes. Better CLIP Text Encoder, Resolution Provider,  Multimask Write/Read,  TextBoxes Simple/Join/x2/x3, Sliders INT/FLOAT/STEPPER, String Tool/Squisher/Cutter, Create Solid Color, Fill with Color, Checkerboard Generator, Image Progress Bar

custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-LoadLoraModelOnlyWithUrl

custom_nodes.author: huanngzh
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MVAdapter
custom_nodes.description: This extension integrates [a/MV-Adapter](https://github.com/huanngzh/MV-Adapter) into ComfyUI, allowing users to generate multi-view consistent images from text prompts or single images directly within the ComfyUI interface.

custom_nodes.author: kimara-ai
custom_nodes.title: Kimara.ai's Advanced Watermarking Tools
custom_nodes.description: The KimaraAIWatermarker custom node allows you to apply watermark text and logo overlays to images. Optionally, the watermark can be moved by the move_watermark_step amount of pixels after each generated image. To apply a moving watermark to a list of images, use the KimaraAIBatchImages node to concatenate the list into a single tensor, then use that as an input for the watermark node, as shown in the example image below.

custom_nodes.author: PauldeLavallaz
custom_nodes.title: Claude Prompt Generator
custom_nodes.description: Node that generates prompts using Anthropic Claude API.

custom_nodes.author: NyaamZ

custom_nodes.description: Get tag from Booru site.

custom_nodes.author: Aerse
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Seed-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Seed-Nodes is a custom node library that extends the functionality of ComfyUI, offering advanced image loading and pixelation tools.

custom_nodes.author: ClownsharkBatwing
custom_nodes.title: RES4LYF
custom_nodes.description: Advanced samplers with new noise scaling math to enable SDE sampling with all publicly available rectified flow models; new unsampling/noise inversion methods and other advanced techniques for inpainting and/or guiding the sampling process with latent images. 40 sampler types, 20 noise types, 7 noise scaling modes, in a single node. Also includes a wide variety of QoF and other utility nodes for manipulating sigmas, latents, images, and more.

custom_nodes.author: duskfallcrew
custom_nodes.title: Embedding Merge for ComfyUI
